items.name: Caramel Craze Latte
items.description: Espresso with caramel drizzle and whipped cream
items.longDescription: A Dunkin signature latte layered with bold espresso, caramel-flavored swirl, and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream and caramel drizzle for an indulgent finish.

items.name: Cocoa Mocha Latte
items.description: Chocolate-forward espresso drink finished with mocha drizzle
items.longDescription: Balanced espresso, mocha swirl, and steamed milk create a smooth chocolate latte crowned with whipped cream and cocoa powder for an elevated Dunkin moment.

items.name: Toasted Almond Cold Foam Latte
items.description: Iced latte with toasted almond swirl and cold foam cap
items.longDescription: Chilled espresso poured over ice with toasted almond flavor, finished with vanilla cold foam for layered texture and sweetness.

items.name: Original Cold Brew
items.longDescription: Smooth, full-bodied cold brew handcrafted daily and served over ice. Add cold foam or a flavor swirl for a personalized sip.

items.name: Strawberry Dragonfruit Refresher
items.description: Green tea-based refresher with B vitamins
items.longDescription: Vibrant strawberry dragonfruit flavor balanced with green tea and B vitamins for a light, energizing beverage without dairy.

items.name: Brown Sugar Cream Cold Brew
items.description: Cold brew with brown sugar syrup and cinnamon-sugar cold foam
items.longDescription: Slow-steeped cold brew sweetened with brown sugar syrup, topped with cinnamon-sugar dusted cold foam for a layered finish.

items.name: Glazed Donut
items.description: Classic yeast donut coated in vanilla glaze
items.longDescription: Soft, airy donut finished with a signature sweet glaze. Pair it with hot coffee for the quintessential Dunkin duo.

items.name: Boston Kreme Donut
items.description: Custard-filled donut topped with chocolate icing
items.longDescription: A nod to Dunkin's New England roots featuring silky Bavarian cream and rich chocolate icing.

items.name: Everything Bagel & Cream Cheese
items.description: Toasted everything bagel with plain cream cheese
items.longDescription: Freshly toasted bagel coated with sesame, poppy seeds, garlic, and onion, served with cool cream cheese spread.

items.name: MUNCHKINS® Donut Hole Treats (10 ct)
items.longDescription: Shareable assortment of glazed, chocolate, and jelly MUNCHKINS donut holes—perfect for offices and carpool lines.

items.name: Bacon Egg & Cheese on Croissant
items.description: Cherrywood smoked bacon, eggs, and American cheese
items.longDescription: A flaky croissant stacked with cherrywood smoked bacon, fluffy eggs, and melty cheese to fuel busy mornings.

items.name: Power Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Multi-grain bread with turkey sausage and egg whites
items.longDescription: Better-for-you build with veggie egg white omelet, turkey sausage, and aged white cheddar on seeded multigrain bread.

items.name: Turkey Sausage Wake-Up Wrap
items.description: Egg and turkey sausage in a warm tortilla
items.longDescription: Portable protein with scrambled egg, turkey sausage, and American cheese inside a grilled tortilla.

items.name: Flavor Swirl Add-On
items.description: Caramel, mocha, French vanilla, or seasonal swirl
items.longDescription: Rich, creamy swirls that add sweetness and color to any hot or iced beverage.

items.name: Whipped Cream
items.longDescription: Finish drinks with house-made whipped cream for extra texture and presentation.

items.name: Extra Espresso Shot
items.longDescription: Boost any beverage with a fresh-pulled Dunkin espresso shot for added intensity.
